Package de.unisiegen.tpml.core.interpreters

Interface Summary
InterpreterProofModel Base interface for the big and small step interpreter proof models.
InterpreterProofNode Base interface for big and small step interpreter proof nodes, used in the InterpreterProofModels.
Store Base interface to stores used in the big and small step interpreters to implement memory operations.
 

Class Summary
AbstractInterpreterProofModel Abstract base class for all classes implementing the InterpreterProofModel interface.
AbstractInterpreterProofNode Abstract base class for big and small step interpreter proof nodes, used in the AbstractInterpreterProofModels.
DefaultStore Default implementation of the Store interface, which is based on the abstract AbstractEnvironment class.
